# position

**Instance Property**

The position of the accessory relative to the primary pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var position: __UIPointerAccessoryPosition { get }
```

## Getting the position

- **UIPointerAccessory.Position**: A structure that specifies the position of the accessory relative to the primary pointer.
